snippet: The family of Penny Pritzker, the nominee for commerce secretary, may draw interest from Republican senators for sheltering their wealth from taxes.
abstract: Pres Obama, in nominating heiress and businesswoman Penny Pritzker as commerce secretary, is investing his administration's political capital in trying to get her confirmed in a toxic political atmosphere; her family members, who in 2008 were said to have resisted any nomination because their assets were entangled, may draw interest from Republican senators for sheltering their wealth.
lead_paragraph: The family of Penny Pritzker, the nominee for commerce secretary, may draw interest from Republican senators for sheltering their wealth from taxes.

headline.seo: In Penny Pritzker’s ’08 Answers on Finances, Hints at Road Ahead
headline.main: Cabinet Pick’s Finances May Foreshadow Battle
headline.print_headline: In Commerce Pick’s ’08 Answers on Finances, Possible Hints at Road Ahead
